title: About
text:
Hi, I’m Jesus Quispe

I’m a Economist (PUCP). I worked in research and the insurance sector. I blog about statistics, programming, and data analytics applied in quantitative finance, actuarial science or economics.
I have extensive experience with causal inference, regression analysis, spatial analysis, econometrics, actuarial analytics.
I excel at applied statistics, especially developing new methods to analyze complex data sets.
I love to collaborate with scientists and product teams on involved projects.
You can find my resume here. I’m currently based in Lima,Peru
